name: @cumulus/db-migration-lambda
description: A Lambda function used for deploying DB migrations

scripts.db:local:schema: env PGPASSWORD=password pg_dump -h localhost -U postgres --schema-only --no-owner | egrep -v '^--' | cat -s | tee schema.sql
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run tsc && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack && (cd dist/webpack && zip lambda.zip index.js)
